title: Understanding the Structure-Activity Relationship of Additives for Durable Zn Metal Battery: A Case Study of Aromatic Molecules
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03232B, Paper
DA-QIAN CAI, Haiyang Cheng, Jin-Lin Yang, Huan Liu, Tao Xiao, Xin Liu, Minghua Chen, Hong Jin Fan
Detrimental dendrites growth and parasitic side reactions greatly hinder the practical application of aqueous metal batteries. Despite many reports on exploring electrolyte additives to mitigate the above issues, the structure-activity...
